newsitem.title: UK: Edinburgh Fund clarifies profit report.
newsitem.headline: Edinburgh Fund clarifies profit report.

text.p: Edinburgh Fund Managers Group Plc said on Thursday that newspaper reports that 1997 pre-tax profits would be 17.4 million stg had been taken from a confidential internal memo, dated early January.
It said details of the profit estimate which appeared in Scottish newspaper The Herald, were considered a reasonable estimate based on funds under management and exchange rates at that time.

The company said that the audit of year end figures would be conducted in the usual manner and preliminary results for the year ending January 31 would be announced in accordance with the usual timetable.
In 1996 the group reported pre-tax profits of 12.8 million stg.
